quote: The best of us sometimes eat our words.   – Albus Dumbledore
fact: The characters Bert and Ernie on Sesame Street were named after Bert the cop and Ernie the taxi driver in Frank Capra`s "Its A Wonderful Life."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why do fish live in salt water? Because pepper makes them sneeze!
